description:
Principles and guidelines to develop, deliver and evaluate exercise and physical activity programs for individuals and groups. Focuses on developing safe and effective prescriptions for healthy individuals. Includes practical skills in exercise leadership and prescription and an introduction to musculoskeletal rehabilitation.
This course had the previous code of HMST7362 which can be viewed in the archived area within the Course and Program site http://www.uq.edu.au/study/archive/index.html
prerequisites: Valid Apply First Aid and CPR certificate
